item.description:
Mirabai Ceiba's Angelika Baumbach and Markus Sieber have forged an engaging new style of world devotional music blending Gurmukhi mantras from the Kundalini Yoga tradition with original songs in English and Spanish that reflect a Native American influence and also draw words of wisdom from Rumi, Thich Nhat Hanh, Guru Nanak and Yogi Bhajan. Through exquisitely crafted recordings like their album One Hundred Blessings, Mirabai Ceiba weave a beguiling tapestry from these diverse influence and sources. Their music feels like: a beneficent and abundant gift from the universe. In concert, they inspire all present to chant together in a spirit of compassionate love and Oneness.  www.mirabaiceiba.com

Register for this event

Watch Mirabai Ceiba videos:  Har Har Mukunday, One Hundred Blessings

This event is brought to you by HartfordChants and Spirit Voyage

with the support of Alchemy Juice Bar, The Conduit Center, and Vital Life Center
item.name: Concert with Mirabai Ceiba
